how_did_you_hear_about_us: Before we start, please tell us how you heard about us?
choose_profile_picture: Choose a photo to represent you.
profile_picture_tip: Using a clear face photo will make clients more likely to choose you over just using a logo.
setup_basic_info: Set up basic information to build trust
username_description: This name will appear on the website and your profile page.
display_name_tip: Choose a meaningful name to build trust.
freelance_type: Type of Freelance Work (Can be changed later)
freelance_type_instruction: Choose the type of freelance work that suits you, even part-time.
bio_statistic: Over 80% of clients read your profile before deciding to hire.
bio_instruction: Introduce yourself to help clients understand you better.
bio_details: Tell us about your work experience, such as work history, education, and relevant certifications.
experience_skills_instruction: Tell us about your experience, skills, and abilities...
experience_skills_details: Provide information about your work experience, key skills, and what you excel at.
upload_id_instruction: Upload your ID card for secure transactions.
id_front_instruction: Take a photo showing the front of your ID card.
id_back_instruction: Take a photo showing the back of your ID card.
check_accuracy: Donâ€™t forget to check the accuracy before saving.
address_details_instruction: Specify the address, village/hamlet, street, alley/lane.
birth_date_note: Age does not affect hiring, but it impacts labor laws.
contact_info_instruction: So we can send you contact information.
transfer_verification_instruction: Please transfer any amount to verify your freelancer account.
transfer_to_verify: Transfer any amount to this account to complete verification.
pay_later_verification: You can pay later to confirm becoming a freelancer.
fastwork_usage_tip: Using Fastwork correctly reduces the risk of account suspension.
compliance_tip: Compliance with regulations helps you avoid bans and earn income securely.
no_off_platform_payment: Prohibited to request/receive payments outside the system
